column1: '''John Boorman''' is a director who had planned to adapt [[The Lord of the Rings]] to film
column2: however the plan fell through and he directed ''Excalibur'' instead.

column1: I met Tolkien when I was preparing the film and he asked me if the film would be live-action or animated; he was relieved we weren't animating the film. Well, we all know what subsequently happened with Ralph Bakshi's version of Lord of the Rings which was animated.<ref name="Wired">[newspaperarchive.com]
